alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 12 at 7:59PM PST until December 14 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet is possible above 7000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult if not impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow accumulations are possible on the Grapevine portion of Interstate 5 between Tuesday and Tuesday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains
